title: Miles Davis - On The Corner 1972 (2007 Remaster)
description:
Miles Davis's Ã¢â‚¬Å“On the CornerÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (1972) is hailed as a visionary musical statement that was way ahead of its time. One of Davis' most influential electric recordings, a combination of jazz and rock, european experimental music and black american funk, inspired by both Karl Heinz Stockhausen and Sly and the Family Stone. A total masterpiece from beginning to end. Simply awesome in its scope and delivery. 


Miles Davis
